> *the door to the controle room opens as she
> approaches, making the shadows 
> receed and reveil a transformer there when, before,
> there seemed to be 
> nothing other there but shadow.
> She was just about to enter when a voice suddenly
> greets her from behind, 
> making her stop and look over her shoulder at Fliq,
> recognizing the bot 
> beside him as the transformer he'd brough in before
> and taken to the cr 
> chambers.
> Iron Raptor half turned to them, clenching her fists
> for a second of two to 
> flex them, her expression blank.*
> 
> " At ease."
> 
> * This was a surprise to her, wondering what this
> bot was doing roaming 
> around as free as ever inside of a base that was
> obviously now his.
> She looked at him and then turned her eyes towards
> Fliq.*
> 
> " What was the oder I gave you before you removed
> him from my sight the 
> first time?"

Strafe spoke up. "Maximals, trustworthy as ever. You
don't need to worry about me. I gave my word that I
wouldn't harm Fliq or his allies...which it's obvious
that you're among...unless shot at or otherwise
physically provoked. But I understand how wary you
are, Iron Raptor. I don't blame you. I wouldn't trust
me either. But I assure you my intentions toward all
of you are peaceful."
